description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useNotesState' that manages an in-memory list of notes with CRUD operations, providing functionality to select, create, update, and delete notes. It initializes with some mock notes for demonstration purposes.

methods.name: useNotesState()
methods.description: A React hook that manages notes state, allowing CRUD operations, initialized with some mock notes.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Function to select a note by its ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Function to create a new, untitled note and add it to the notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Function to update an existing note by merging provided fields.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Function to delete a note by its ID.
